Hi!

Happy to see you here. I'm Zayed, a computer programmer. Developing software, games, and web applications is my passion. I like creating interactive and modern digital experiences. Where art and technology converge, they open doors to diverse challenges and innovative futures. I embrace these opportunities with enthusiasm, ready to explore and push the boundaries beyond the imaginable.


Services/Works

Here are some key categories that describe my work:


Game Development

I bring a strong foundation in game logic, scripting, and tool-building. With a technical artist background, I craft custom 3D assets, including photorealistic and low-poly models. My major skills in this area include C++, C#, and Java, allowing me to handle both gameplay mechanics and artistic elements.

Web Development

As a full-stack developer, I can handle both frontend and backend work, building complete web applications. My experience spans JavaScript, Python, CSS, HTML, SQL, and more, making me adaptable to various web development needs, from interactive interfaces to database integration.

Software Development

In software development, I specialize in creating efficient, user-friendly applications. My experience covers design, testing, and deployment, with proficiency in C++, Python, and Java. I focus on building scalable, secure solutions that meet the demands of modern software projects.
